pullRequest.title: Add ThreadPoolExecutor for handle kafka message.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Please answer these questions before submitting a pull request


Why submit this pull request?


 Bug fix


 New feature provided


 Improve performance


Related issues



Bug fix


Bug description.


How to fix?



New feature or improvement

Describe the details and related test reports.
1.Add ThreadPoolExecutor for handle kafka message.
2.Add enableKafkaMessageAutoCommit config  to control auto commit kafka message.

commit.message:
1.Add ThreadPoolExecutor for handle kafka message.
2.Add `enableKafkaMessageAutoCommit` to control auto commit kafka message.

nodes.bodyText:
I suggest that is directly using enable.auto.commit.
That means we don't need to introduce a new configuration.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -198,8 +198,11 @@ core|default|role|Option values, `Mixed/Receiver/Aggregator`. **Receiver** mode
 | - | - | isSharding | it was true when OAP Server in cluster. | SW_KAFKA_FETCHER_IS_SHARDING | false |
 | - | - | createTopicIfNotExist | If true, create the Kafka topic when it does not exist. | - | true |
 | - | - | partitions | The number of partitions for the topic being created. | SW_KAFKA_FETCHER_PARTITIONS | 3 |
-| - | - | enableMeterSystem | To enable to fetch and handle [Meter System](backend-meter.md) data. | SW_KAFKA_FETCHER_ENABLE_METER_SYSTEM | false
+| - | - | enableMeterSystem | To enable to fetch and handle [Meter System](backend-meter.md) data. | SW_KAFKA_FETCHER_ENABLE_METER_SYSTEM | false |
 | - | - | replicationFactor | The replication factor for each partition in the topic being created. | SW_KAFKA_FETCHER_PARTITIONS_FACTOR | 2 |
+| - | - | enableKafkaMessageAutoCommit | If true the consumer's offset will be periodically committed in the background. | SW_ENABLE_KAFKA_MESSAGE_AUTO_COMMIT | false |

nodes.bodyText: Change the condition to no enable.auto.commit. :)

I don't think we still need this single thread pool when we introduce the thread pool. @zifeihan
Could we use the same one?

  
    
      skywalking/oap-server/server-fetcher-plugin/kafka-fetcher-plugin/src/main/java/org/apache/skywalking/oap/server/analyzer/agent/kafka/KafkaFetcherHandlerRegister.java
    
    
         Line 154
      in
      b79436e
    
    
    
    

        
          
           Executors.newSingleThreadExecutor(new DefaultThreadFactory("KafkaConsumer")).submit(this);

If you need to reuse this, CustomThreadFactory should move from org.apache.skywalking.oap.server.library.server.grpc to org.apache.skywalking.oap.server.library.server.pool. Otherwise, the codes look like, Kafka is using gRPC pool.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * Improve Kafka data consumption capacity.
          
          
            
            * Add the thread pool to the Kafka fetcher to increase the performance.
nodes.diffHunk:

 * Support keeping collecting the slowly segments in the sampling mechanism.
 * Support choose files to active the meter analyzer.
 * Improve Kubernetes service registry for ALS analysis.
+* Improve Kafka data consumption capacity.

nodes.bodyText: Traditionally, -1 means using the default value. 0 means size == 0. Please fix this.
